chinese: n. 威胁，恐吓
english: threat

chinese: 这个大块头正在威胁那个穿蓝衣服的人。
english: The big guy is making a threat to the man in blue

chinese: n.二氧化物
english: dioxide

chinese: 二氧化碳正在使地球变暖。
english: Carbon dioxide is making our planet warmer

chinese: n。（强加于人身的）痛苦
english: infliction

chinese: 惨重伤亡带来的痛苦迫使这位国王投降。
english: The infliction of heavy casualties forced the king to surrender

chinese: adj坚持的；持续的
english: persistent

chinese: 在爬山的过程中，你会学会坚持不懈的精神。
english: You'll learn to be persistent when climbing mountains

chinese: n信仰；相信，信任；信心；被信仰之物；看法
english: belief

chinese: 吃肉的做法正确与否，取决于个人的信仰。
english: The rights and wrongs of eating meat are subject to personal beliefs

chinese: 1.感官 v.觉得，意识到
english: sense

chinese: 人类有五种感觉：嗅觉，味觉，视觉，触觉和
english: There are 5 human senses: smell, taste, sight, touch and hearing

chinese: vt. 打败n.挫败
english: defeat

chinese: 他打败了对手，赢得了这场羽毛球比赛。
english: He defeated his opponent and won the badminton match

chinese: n.恐吓
english: intimidation

chinese: 这个男人被他老板的恐吓吓住了。
english: The man was scared by his boss's intimidation

chinese: n.索赔；主张；声明；断言以.声称：断言；主张；认领，要求（拥有）；索赔
english: claim

chinese: 我想为汽车遭受的损失提出保险索赔。
english: I want to make an insurance claim for the damage of my car

chinese: v出现，冒出；兴起；浮现
english: emerge

chinese: 一只小兔子从洞口钻出来找吃的。
english: A little rabbit emerged from the hole to look for food

chinese: cd）.业余爱好的，业余（身份）的n.业余爱好者
english: amateur

chinese: 这个上班族也是一名业余足球运动员。
english: This office worker is also an amateur soccer player

chinese: v.侵犯，违反，侵害
english: infringe

chinese: 这家杂志上的文章侵害了这位女演员的隐私。
english: This magazine article infringed on the privacy of the actress

chinese: vi渴望，极想ad）. 长的adv. 长久地，长期地
english: long

chinese: 那个女孩渴望再见到她的男朋友。
english: That girl longed to see her boyfriend again

chinese: ad.辛辣的，有风味的
english: spicy

chinese: 这碗海鲜看上去又辣又好吃。
english: The bowl of sea food looks very spicy and yummy

chinese: adi.错综复杂的
english: intricate

chinese: 这只手表的内部构造十分复杂精细。
english: The inside of this watch is quite intricate

chinese: n. 针灸（疗法）
english: acupuncture

chinese: 我因为背痛而接受了针灸疗法。
english: I received acupuncture treatment for my back pain
